openEPDA Overview
=================

About openEPDA
--------------

.. _about:

openEPDAâ„¢ is a collection of open standards to be used in electronic-photonic
design automation. As of December 2018, these include  definition of
the openEPDA data format v.0.1. See Section Roadmap for the planned activities.

Roadmap
-------

.. _roadmap:

The following standards / libraries are planned to be implemented before the
end of 2018.

* openEPDA data format
* openEPDA data format writer / reader for python
* openEPDA equipment API for python

Authors
-------

.. _authors:

openEPDA is developed by TU/e and PITC. openEPDA is a trademark of TU/e and PITC.
